statements: DELETE FROM wind_monitoring WHERE altitude > 100 AND wind_speed < 10.0;
DELETE FROM wind_monitoring WHERE wind_speed >= 15.0 AND wind_direction = 'North';
DELETE FROM WindData WHERE altitude = 100 AND wind_speed > 50.0;
DELETE FROM AltitudeInfo WHERE altitude_name = 'High Altitude';
DELETE FROM WindSpeedStatistics WHERE altitude = 100 AND avg_wind_speed < 10.5;
DELETE FROM altitude_data WHERE altitude_name = 'Mt. Everest';
DELETE FROM sensor_measurement WHERE sensor_id = 3 AND sensor_value > 100;
